Contact the team

Special Acknowledgements:

Cardinal is built on important work by Michael Busha, Matthew Becker, and Gus Evrard.

ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS:

We thank Wei-Hao Wang for providing M31 image. We thank Andres Salcedo and Lyra Cao for providing some Cardinal pictures. The Cardinal simulation made use of public data from the Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) and the Dark Energy Survey (DES). The background image is generated using https://github.com/vargatn/synthetic, a wrapper of galsim (https://github.com/GalSim-developers/GalSim). The Cardinal photo in the home page was taken by Janet Griffin-Scott and was purchased through iStock. Part of the website desgin is inspired by https://sagasurvey.org/.
